### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** Furniture for Fredericton Project
**Reference Number:** cb-892-81935501, Amendment 7
**Publication Date:** November 23, 2023

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Details:**

* A request for proposal (RFP) is issued to acquire office furniture for Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) in Fredericton, New Brunswick, Canada.
* The requirement is specific to office furniture under several categories: Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems, Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products, Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets, Ancillary and Lighting Products, and Support Space – Collaborative Furniture.
* The furniture will be purchased and installed at the designated IRCC location.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement and Amendments:**

* This RFP is part of the IRCC’s overall procurement plan, issued under Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C.
* The tender process involves competitive-selective tendering, with the lowest price being the primary evaluation criterion.
* The original tender solicitation, as well as Amendments 1 and 2, have been released. Amendment 2 extends the bid solicitation period and updates Annex A, Requirement and Basis of Payment.

**Supply Arrangement and Trade Agreements:**

* Suppliers must have a general stream supply arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-140003/C to participate in this RFP.
* The tender is open to suppliers from various countries, including but not limited to Canada, under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other trade agreements.

**Bid Instructions and Contact Information:**

* Suppliers interested in this RFP must submit their bids via email to IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca.
* The bids will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the RFP documentation.
* For further information, including questions and bid submission details, please contact Steven French, Procurement Officer, at (613) 293-2493.

**Tender Description and Attachments:**

* The tender description and all relevant attachments can be found in the linked documents below.
* Specific attachments include amendment notices, tender notice, and question and answer round documents in both English and French. [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
